name: Project_Chameleon
description:
Welcome to Project Chameleon. Its a multiplayer FPS with the lights turned off. Use the environment and their projectiles to determine where enemies are located. 

This is an experimental multiplayer FPS I have been working on for a little over two weeks now. Let me know what you guys think. Its only random matchmaking so get a couple of people to get on at the same time and have some fun.

Directions:
  • First one to 10 points wins
  • The environment will light up around you, giving your position away to other players
  • There are no character models. Only small particles that can be seen by players
  • Grab the pickups from the glowing spawnners in order to change weapons
Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to look around
  • Mouse Click to fire a weapon
  • Esc to Pause
Notes:

v1.16 - I am trying to figure out how to implement a patcher so  we dont have to keep downloading new versions. Its still a baby so please excuse the terrible models and textures. This prototype is mainly for testing the FEEL of the game. Please feel free to try it out
